english.segment1: Farewell, so long to you. We've come to the end of the night. It's all been wonderful. A lovely and wonderful time
english.segment2: Say goodnight to. All the friends who. Rocked and rolled beside you
english.segment3: We hope you've enjoyed the show. It's over. It's over. It's all over now
english.segment4: This room will be empty soon. When the music and laughter is gone. This night will be forgot. But the joy you've found can go on
english.segment5: Say goodnight to. All the friends who. Rocked and rolled beside you
english.segment6: We hope you've enjoyed the show. It's over. It's over. It's all over now. The lights come down, don't lose your glow. When it's over. It's over. It's all over now
english.segment7: Is it all over?. Or has it just begun?
